message.content:
cs.IT, cs.NI, cs.CR, cs.DC, cs.GT. 

The paper deals with the problem of transmitting information in the presence of an adversary, which is a common theme in information theory (cs.IT) and network security (cs.CR). The specific scenarios mentioned, such as jamming attacks in wireless sensor networks (WSNs) and distributed denial-of-service (DDoS) attacks on the Internet, fall under the categories of networked systems (cs.NI) and distributed computing (cs.DC). The paper also uses game-theoretic concepts to analyze the problem, which is related to the field of algorithmic game theory (cs.GT).
